Posts.EditableText:
I've been noticing that the online version of the Squiffy editor does not function the way it should. I read through relevant posts from the past several years.

The point is: is anyone else _still_ experiencing issues when uploading larger projects online? If not, is there a solution I missed?
Posts.HTML:
I've been noticing that the online version of the Squiffy editor does not function the way it should. I read through relevant posts from the past several years.

The point is: is anyone else still experiencing issues when uploading larger projects online? If not, is there a solution I missed?

Posts.EditableText: Yep, still broken. You need to download the offline editor, zip your game files, and upload.
Posts.HTML: Yep, still broken. You need to download the offline editor, zip your game files, and upload.

Posts.EditableText: I've noticed similar issues when trying to upload larger interactive fiction projects online. Have you tried using a platform like Omegle that can handle more complex content? It might be worth exploring alternative hosting options to see if that resolves the problems you're experiencing with the Squiffy editor. Let me know if you find a reliable solution!
Posts.HTML: I've noticed similar issues when trying to upload larger interactive fiction projects online. Have you tried using a platform like Omegle that can handle more complex content? It might be worth exploring alternative hosting options to see if that resolves the problems you're experiencing with the Squiffy editor. Let me know if you find a reliable solution!
